aboutdescription.part1: I am a front-end developer and designer based in Seoul, Korea.
aboutdescription.part2:
I started my career as a sportswear designer and product manager with more than two years.
Always I am curious about all things technology and design, from software engineering to UI/UX.
 While working designer, I started learning software frontend development.
 I fell in love with web development when I studying software engineer, mostly focused on the frontend.
 I am excited about the mix of design and creativity, and technical skills. I enjoy the struggle and the satisfaction of figuring something out.
aboutdescription.part3:
I have been predominantly using React and Javascript, but I like to learn other frameworks as well.
 I am focused on the details and accessible user-friendly websites and applications.
aboutdescription.part4: After a little longer than I would have liked, I feel excited and determined to dive into a new career path in web development. If you are interested in more details or working together, see my resume!

translationList.Title: Ollae
translationList.SubTitle: Loaction based community platform
translationList.Introduce: It is a platform that provides dating services to members of single households or new generations who want to start a relationship with a casual meeting that is not deeply related to their personal lives.

CardNumber.Content: Categories allow you to find people or gatherings to take a walk by choosing the topic you want.
With the map view, you can easily find the meeting place and see the meeting walking around you.
Live chat allows you to arrange a specific meeting with the person you want to walk with.

translationList.Title: Bounce
translationList.SubTitle: Global fandom platform for the fans and artists around the world
translationList.Introduce: The Bounce web platforms is artist-to-fan interactions and platforms for users to connect with each other.

CardNumber.Content: Can see the YouTube video list of each artists official channel.
Users can like Button and comment on artists videos.

translationList.Title: ApplePet
translationList.SubTitle: Pet adoption app
translationList.Introduce: Search dogs, cats, rabbits, birds for adoption from thousands of shelters and rescue groups.

CardNumber.Content: Filter based on location and breed.
View photos and detail of adoptable dogs and cats.
Contact shelters quickly and easily to start the adoption process.
